pairing.checkValid(classNum, combo)¶

This function checks if current combo has any repetition from previous pairs

Args:

classNum (str): eg. “1” combo (2D array): eg. [[4,1],[7,10]….]

Returns:

boolean: true/false

pairing.initializeTable(size)¶

This function initialize the 2D array to false

Args:

size (int): eg. 30

Returns:

boolean[][]: True/False

pairing.isValid(todayCombo, table)¶
pairing.pairNow(numOfStudent)¶
pairing.producePair(classNum)¶

This function creates random pairs of people that haven’t been previously paired

Args:

classNum (str): eg. “1”

Returns:

String: paired names in string

  1. Create new pair

  2. if pairing did not satisfy, try again

  3. record the array of satisfied combos to middle.txt

  4. return the string of paired names

pairing.record(validCombo, table)¶
pairing.recordValidCombo(classNum, validCombo, placement)¶

This function records combo into database<classNum>.txt or middle<classNum>.txt

Args:

classNum (str): eg. “1” validCombo (2D array): eg. [[4,1],[7,10]….] placement (str): eg. “database”, “middle”

Returns:

add new pairings as True values
